context: Good Morning what have you seen recently?
Have you seen the new The Avengers (2012) movie? Im great by the way
Yes I have. I liked it. Have you?
I haven't seen it yet but I heard it was a awesome movie
It really was. I just didnt care for the ending. At least there is another one coming out next summer. How about a comedy?
Okay cool I will have to get to see it. What about Deadpool 2 (2018) that have to be funny right Or Life of the Party (2018)
I havent seen that one. I plan to though. I am sure it will be great! I have heard of that one what is it about?
It's with Melissa McCarthy going to college with her daughter
Oh yeah!! That looks funny! I will check it out!
cool beans What is your favorite movie of all times?

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific type of movie or TV show?

I'm really into suspenseful and intense criminal films, emotional and thought-provoking dramas, and thrilling thrillers with gripping suspense. I'm looking for something that combines all of these elements. Any recommendations?
context.feelings: I'm filled with anticipation to explore new cinematic worlds and experience intense criminal films, emotional dramas, and thrilling suspense all at once. I can't wait to see what the recommender suggests!

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "Hannibal (2001)" for its intense and suspenseful storyline, as well as its emotional and thought-provoking elements.
That sounds interesting! Can you tell me more about "Hannibal (2001)"? What's the storyline like?
context.feelings: I'm excited to explore "Hannibal (2001)"! I hope it has the perfect blend of suspense, emotion, and thrill that I'm looking for. I wonder what makes this movie so intense and emotional. I can't wait to find out!

context.content: "Hannibal (2001)" is a psychological thriller that follows the story of Dr. Hannibal Lecter, a brilliant psychiatrist and cannibalistic serial killer, and FBI agent Clarice Starling. The film delves into their complex and intense relationship as they become entangled in a dangerous game of cat and mouse. It's filled with suspense, drama, and thought-provoking themes.

Wow, "Hannibal (2001)" sounds really intriguing! I love the idea of a psychological thriller with intense and suspenseful elements. The complex relationship between the characters adds an emotional depth that I'm really drawn to. I'm definitely up for watching this movie. [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited to watch "Hannibal (2001)"! It seems to have the intense criminal elements I love, and the complex relationship between the characters promises emotional depth. The recommender did a great job understanding my preferences and recommending a movie that aligns with them. I can't wait to experience this thrilling and thought-provoking film.
